name: tabsorter
description: Chrome拡張 - タブを指定ルールで並び替え

scripts.copy:options: powershell -Command "Copy-Item options/index.html dist/options/; Copy-Item options/style.css dist/options/"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:options && npm run copy:manifest && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:options
scripts.dev: npm run build:all && echo 'Build completed. Load dist folder as unpacked extension in Chrome.'
